import React, { useState } from "react" import './../css/chat.css' function Profile(props) { const[field, setField] = useState({ firstName:'name', lastName:'lastname', email:'z@k.com', profilePic:'' }); return(
firstName: setField(e.target.value)} />

{field.firstName}

lastName: setField(e.target.value)} />

{field.lastName}

setField(e.target.value)} />

{field.email}

); } export default Profile
